member.name: IMAGE_NT_HEADERS.Signature
member.summary: A 4-byte signature identifying the file as a PE image. The bytes are "PE\0\0".

member.name: IMAGE_NT_HEADERS.FileHeader
member.summary: An structure that specifies the file header.

member.name: IMAGE_NT_HEADERS.OptionalHeader
member.summary: An structure that specifies the optional file header.
